title: 2022 Overall NBA Playoff Picture
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps are reunited with the legend Jackie MacMullan to break down the NBA Playoff picture including if the Celtics should be favored over the Nets, how key injuries will impact a few key series and if Harden and Embiid can make a statement. Plus, the crew talks Jackie’s podcast series ‘Icons’ with the Ringer.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Previewing The NBA Playoff's, The Legend Jackie MacMullan Returns!
